name: Decollate Decoration
storyline:
One thing led to another and you became a Yurei.
You have never done anything wrong, so you must be able to go to Tengoku.
I never doubted it.

But...
No matter how good Tengoku is,
If you are not there, it will be worse than in Hell.

（That's right!)

If I can't go see you anymore, I'll just ask you to come see me.
Before the doors of heaven open, you must come to me.
I'll bring you to this side of the world.
summary: Decollate Decoration is a Japanese-language indie visual novel game, released as a free game in 2023.
